text:
STOP promoting unproven drug therapy for #COVID19 

It’s NOT a treatment just because a reality show host says it is, and Dr. Oz is a jackass who promotes goofy “cures” as his grift.

Leave #chloroquine for the people who NEED it, as we’re depriving people of a needed drug for 0. https://t.co/zR34ZmXpCo
